course_title: Seminar: African Art/Architecture: Art, Evidence, and Ethics
course_description: Advanced seminar on African art and/or architecture with emphasis on critical texts, methods, and techniques of art historical investigation. For art history majors; open to others with permission from the instructor.
sections: Class Nbr: 3141, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: Th 10a-12:45p, Instructor: S. Gagliardi, Status: Open
